entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 5 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
